communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: MAGNETIC SWIPE LOGS - REVISED REQUEST
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:
Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Tuesday November the 14th 

The fact that this is a new request and numbers have changed does not give any agency the right to refrain from releasing this information on a new request.

This request is only for the number of 8 hours or more days logged in to work  and the number of days with less than 8 hours of days logged into work I am are NOT Requesting dates or times just number of days for the following.

Magnetic Swipe logs for , Thomas Parnell McNamara, Chris Eubank, Rebecca Eubank, and Cody Blossman for 901 Washington, Hwy 6 Jail and Jack Harwell Detention Center
Sing In Logs for, Thomas Parnell McNamara, Chris Eubank, Rebecca Eubank, and Cody Blossman for 901 Washington, Hwy 6 Jail and Jack Harwell Detention Center
Or any record Keeping method of physical presence or time spent at 901 Washington or Hwy 6 Jail and Jack Harwell Detention Center

For the following time frames.
January the 1st 2013 until December 31st, 2013
January the 1st 2014 until December 31st, 2014
January the 1st 2015 until December 31st, 2015
January the 1st 2016 until December 31st, 2016
January the 1st 2017 until December 31st, 2017
January the 1st 2018 until December 31st, 2018
January the 1st 2019 until December 31st, 2019, to include the takeover the Jack Harwell Detention Center in September 2019
January the 1st 2020 until December 31st, 2020
January the 1st 2021 until December 31st, 2021
January the 1st 2022 until December 31st, 2022
January the 1st 2023 until October 20, 2023
#4
Need total number of employees at the McLennan County Jail during each yearly period.
January the 1st 2013 until December 31st, 2013
January the 1st 2014 until December 31st, 2014
January the 1st 2015 until December 31st, 2015
January the 1st 2016 until December 31st, 2016
January the 1st 2017 until December 31st, 2017
January the 1st 2018 until December 31st, 2018
January the 1st 2019 until December 31st, 2019, to include the takeover the Jack Harwell Detention Center in September 2019
January the 1st 2020 until December 31st, 2020
January the 1st 2021 until December 31st, 2021
January the 1st 2022 until December 31st, 2022
January the 1st 2023 until October 20, 2023
The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.
In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.
Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.
Sincerely,
Bernadette Feazell
